entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 04:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
